Events that occurred on 29 December.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1928 - Actor and narrator Bernard Cribbins is born.
1953 - J.R.R. Tolkien visits Allen and Unwin at Museum Street in London.
1959 - Actor Brian Sergent is born.
1961 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Miss Perry.
1965 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 282a.
1966 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 293.
1968 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 307a.
1976 - Director Dome Karukoski is born.
1980 - Amon Hen 48 is published.
1994 - Tyalië Tyelelliéva issue 3 is published.
2008 - Artist Kay Woollard dies.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
This date marks the beginning of the six-day Yuletide festival in the Shire Calendar.
T.A. 3018:
The Fellowship of the Ring travels south along the Misty Mountains.
